Hi,

I have a VPS and it has a lot of free resources left.  I'd like to put that to something useful.  So for that, I decided to install an IRC bouncer.  Right now, I'm accepting anyone who requests for an account.  I know this topic is not very popular among LET, but it's the only thing I can think of.  If you have any other suggestions in which I can provide a "service", please do suggest.  

The bouncer is currently running ZNC.  A web control panel is available.  PM if you're interested.
